actions.actionName: TURKEY CREEK METALS TMDL

associatedPollutants.TMDLEndPointText:
TOTAL COPPER:  THE LOWEST TOTAL COPPER STANDARD APPLIES TO THE AGL BENEFICIAL USE AND EQUALS 500 G/L.

DISSOLVED COPPER:  THE MOST STRINGENT SURFACE WATER QUALITY STANDARDS FOR DISSOLVED COPPER ARE RELATED TO PROTECTING A&WW FROM CHRONIC EXPOSURE AND ARE HARDNESS-BASED AND THUS VARY WITH THE OBSERVED HARDNESS AT THE TIME OF SAMPLING.

AWW IN UG/L=(E(0.8545[LN(HARDNESS)]-1.702))(0.96)
[I.E. 16.2 PPB DISSOLVED COPPER AT 100 PPM HARDNESS]
